text: Cidade Industrial is a Belo Horizonte Metro station on Line 1. It was opened on 30 July 1999, being added to already functioning section of the line from Eldorado to Minas Shopping. The station is located between Cidade Industrial and Gameleira. ==References== Category:Belo Horizonte Metro stations Category:1999 establishments in Brazil Category:Railway stations opened in 1999
title: Vila Oeste station
